text:
Hey everybody, I'm currently doing the serverless function tutorial: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-serverless-functions>
everything was working fine and the serverless function is executing fine on: <https://HubSpot-developers-19qir3g-24921815.hs-sites-eu1.com/_hcms/api/congratulation>
But when I come to point 8. after creating the page I'll get following error in the console:
```Access to fetch at '<https://HubSpot-developers-19qir3g-24921815.hs-sites-eu1.com/_hcms/api/congratulation>' from origin '<http://HubSpot-developers-19qir3g-24921815.hs-sites-eu1.com>' has been blocked by CORS policy: Response to preflight request doesn't pass access control check: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. If an opaque response serves your needs, set the request's mode to 'no-cors' to fetch the resource with CORS disabled.```
What to do?
Thank you for your help :)
